docket_entries.description: Chapter 7 Voluntary Petition, Certificate of Credit Counseling, Schedules and Statements, Master Mailing List, Statement of Current Monthly Income and Means-Test (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than 5 calendar days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 12/15/2009, filed by RANDOLPH D. WOLFSON of THE WOLFSON LAW CENTER P.C. on behalf of JANICE Y RAMIREZ (WOLFSON, RANDOLPH) Modified on 11/30/2009 (Urbalejo, Aida). (Entered: 11/25/2009)
